articles.title: Scientists Find ‘Impossible’ Crystal Created by World’s First Nuclear Bomb - Indian Defence Review
articles.description: A crystal, formed during the first nuclear bomb test at Trinity, offers new insights into nuclear explosions and could pave the way for future nuclear forensics.
